quiz.title: Example Quiz
quiz.description:
This is an **example** quiz!
You should read
before taking this quiz. :)

questions.question:
## Basic Markdown formatting
> 'Twas brillig and the slithy toves > did gire and gimble in the wabe
In the following, `foobar` is a function.
```python def foobar(): return baz() + 7 ```
| I | Like | Tables | |----|---------|-------------| |woot| wootage | woot-wootage| |:) | :-) | :D |
This is an equation: $$foo(n) = bar(n) + 7^8 + baz_2$$
And these equations should be inline: \(a^7 + b_2 = 3 \cdot x\) and \(x_i + y_n = z^2\)
Zebras have **5** legs.

What is the capital of France?
Paris London Berlin Madrid

Which of the following are programming languages?
Python JavaScript HTML CSS

Match the following countries with their capitals.
London Rome Lisbon

Which of the following statements are true?
Python is a programming language. HTML is a programming language. JavaScript can be used for web development. CSS is a programming language.
The capital of France is [blank].
The U.S. flag has [stripes] stripes and [stars] stars.
The U.S. flag has [13] stripes and [50] stars.
Discuss the impact of technology on modern education.
Upload your project files for review.
What is π?
Give a value for x such that 1 ≤ x ≤ 10.
What is the value of π?
